definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Later, those boats were heavily outrun by modern ships.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，那些船很重地根據現代船跑得更快。

sentences.english: the massive foot stomps down where he just was.
sentences.chinese: 機甲碩大的腳重重地踏在他剛纔的位置上。

sentences.english: It flamed out and fell heavily on the table.
sentences.chinese: 那機器人最終噴出火花重重地摔在桌面上。

sentences.english: I bent down and so did he, and we bashed heads.
sentences.chinese: 我彎下身子，他也一樣，我們的頭重重地碰在了一起。

sentences.english: Well implement the enter limited regulations of power distribution room.
sentences.chinese: 執行好配電重地的門禁制定。

sentences.english: Dad took the fiddle to the telephone and thumped the strings.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸把小提琴拿到話機旁，重重地撥弄了幾下琴絃。

sentences.english: Wear who, food database momentous precincts, person with no duty at, presently and soon quit.
sentences.chinese: 來着何人，糧庫重地，閒雜人等，速速離開。

sentences.english: The chairman prefaced his remarks with some sharp raps on the table.
sentences.chinese: 主席重重地敲了幾下桌子，然後開始講話。

sentences.english: Jack swung a slow, heavy right hand at Tom.
sentences.chinese: 傑克慢慢揮起右手，朝湯姆重重地擊了一掌。

sentences.english: The site said, "Today was a seminal moment in Internet history."
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜的離去給互聯網的歷史又重重地描上了一筆。

sentences.english: Tom had a bad fall and arrived home with mud on his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆重重地摔了一跤，到家時滿身都是泥。

sentences.english: You knock the door of my heart deeply.
sentences.chinese: 你重重地扣開了我的心扉之門。

sentences.english: He said sarcastically. Annabel whacked him on the head.
sentences.chinese: 安娜貝利重重地給了他腦袋一拳。

sentences.english: He finished the glass and plunked it down firmly on the table.
sentences.chinese: 喝完酒之後，他將玻璃杯重重地擱到桌上。

definition: (military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)
to hold a pass/to guard (a strategic location)
Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Gyeonggi Province, South Korea, surrounding Seoul and Incheon, capital Suweon City 水原市[Shui3 yuan2 shi4]
